name: Survival guide to the end of the world
name_original: Survival guide to the end of the world
description:
Have you found yourself stuck in the middle of the Biblical Apocalypse? Don't be upset! Find yourself a guardian angel who will protect you!

Info

Features a dismal story, lots of custom art, multiple endings and routes.

Trigger warnings

Blood
Suicide
Depression
War description
Death
Religion

Instructions

Arrows = Move
Cursor = Select
SPACE or ENTER or Z = Examine / Advance text
SHIFT = Run F4 / ALT+ENTER = Fullscreen
ESC or X = Menu / Cancel

Download the ZIP file, extract it and run "Game.exe". 
How to get all endings is described in the text file "spoilers".
